channel.title: How Do i Run [508] Server?
channel.description:
Uhm Alwase when i try Build.bat or Run.bat i get the same result : [code]wait espeon compiling source Compiling net.com.espeon.net.codec The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.model The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.model.update The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.model.items The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.model.misc The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.model.combat The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.io The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.io.packethandler The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.net The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.util The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.world.mapdata The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.world.items The device is not ready. Press any key to continue. . .[/code] PS:i translate this information in to english
en i use this as my Build en Run [code]@echo off @echo wait espeon source compiling cd ../src echo Compiling net.com.espeon.net.codec "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/net/codec/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.update "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/update/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/items/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.misc "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/misc/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.combat "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/combat/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.io "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/io/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.io.packethandler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/io/packethandler/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.net "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/net/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.util "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/util/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.world.mapdata "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/world/mapdata/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.world.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/world/items/*.java pause[/code] en i got JDK1.7.0 :S this source i use [URL=http://img110.imageshack.us/my.php?image=sourcepicoz0.jpg][IMG]http://img110.imageshack.us/img110/9645/sourcepicoz0.th.jpg[/img][/URL] How can i fix this?:|

item.title: How Do i Run [508] Server?
item.dc:creator: @tom6281 tom6281
item.description:
@tom6281 wrote:

yup im having da same problem too dude any info plz send back[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2008, 05:44:22 am[/size][hr]i think i know what it might be
well i had a laptop with a 64 bit cpu
the i got a computer with a intel core2 duo but only 32 bit
i think you might need a 64 bit proseser to run a 508 server
but i havnt tried it
so dont waste ur money if u can help it

Read full topic

item.title: How Do i Run [508] Server?
item.dc:creator: @Beasty_x Beasty_x
item.description:
@Beasty_x wrote:

Uhm Alwase when i try Build.bat or Run.bat i get the same result : wait espeon compiling source Compiling net.com.espeon.net.codec The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.model The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.model.update The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.model.items The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.model.misc The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.model.combat The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.io The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.io.packethandler The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.net The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.util The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.world.mapdata The device is not ready. Compiling net.com.espeon.world.items The device is not ready. Press any key to continue. . . PS:i translate this information in to english

en i use this as my Build en Run @echo off @echo wait espeon source compiling cd ../src echo Compiling net.com.espeon.net.codec "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/net/codec/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.update "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/update/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/items/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.misc "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/misc/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.model.combat "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/model/combat/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.io "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/io/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.io.packethandler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/io/packethandler/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.net "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/net/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.util "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/util/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.world.mapdata "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/world/mapdata/*.java echo Compiling net.com.espeon.world.items "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../build/ ./net/com/espeon/world/items/*.java pause en i got JDK1.7.0 :S this source i use How can i fix this?
